comment:
* Filter event sent from {@link Filter} objects for TS record data.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public int getScIndexMask()
methods.comment:
* Gets SC (Start Code) index mask. * *

The index type is SC or SC-HEVC, and is set when configuring the filter.

methods.name: public long getDataLength()
methods.comment: * Gets the record data offset from the beginning of the record buffer.

methods.name: public long getPts()
methods.comment:
* Gets the Presentation Time Stamp(PTS) for the audio or video frame. It is based on 90KHz * and has the same format as the PTS in ISO/IEC 13818-1. * *

This field is only supported in Tuner 1.1 or higher version. Unsupported version will * return {@link android.media.tv.tuner.Tuner#INVALID_TIMESTAMP}. Use * {@link android.media.tv.tuner.TunerVersionChecker#getTunerVersion()} to get the version * information.

methods.name: public int getFirstMacroblockInSlice()
methods.comment:
* Get the address of the first macroblock in the slice defined in ITU-T Rec. H.264. * *

This field is only supported in Tuner 1.1 or higher version. Unsupported version will * return {@link android.media.tv.tuner.Tuner#INVALID_FIRST_MACROBLOCK_IN_SLICE}. Use * {@link android.media.tv.tuner.TunerVersionChecker#getTunerVersion()} to get the version * information.
